meta.projectDescription: Iterative Problem-Solving Assistant for VS Code

tasks.title: Project Setup and Foundation
tasks.description: Set up the project structure, development environment, and core foundation for the IPSA VS Code extension.

subtasks.title: Initialize VS Code Extension Project
subtasks.description: Create the initial VS Code extension project structure with TypeScript configuration, ESLint, and necessary dependencies.

subtasks.title: Implement Core Data Structures
subtasks.description: Define and implement the core data structures for session state, plan documents, and findings models.

subtasks.title: Create Document Management System
subtasks.description: Implement the system for creating, reading, updating, and parsing plan documents in Markdown format.

subtasks.title: Set Up Extension Activation Logic
subtasks.description: Implement the extension activation logic and register all commands that will be exposed to the user.

subtasks.title: Implement State Management System
subtasks.description: Create a robust state management system for tracking session state, user preferences, and other persistent data.

tasks.title: Core Functionality Implementation
tasks.description: Implement the core functionality components of the IPSA extension, including session management, prompt construction, and findings extraction.

subtasks.title: Implement Session Management
subtasks.description: Create the complete session management system for creating, resuming, and ending problem-solving sessions.

subtasks.title: Build Prompt Construction Engine
subtasks.description: Implement the engine that constructs contextual prompts by combining the overall goal, current plan step, and relevant findings.

subtasks.title: Develop Findings Extraction System
subtasks.description: Create the system for extracting, categorizing, and storing key findings from AI assistant responses.

subtasks.title: Implement Iteration Control System
subtasks.description: Build the system for managing the iterative problem-solving process, including advancing through plan steps and tracking progress.

subtasks.title: Create Agent Interaction System
subtasks.description: Implement the system for interacting with AI assistants, including sending prompts and capturing responses.

subtasks.title: Develop Output Management System
subtasks.description: Build the system for managing outputs from the problem-solving process, including documentation and code integration.

tasks.title: User Interface Development
tasks.description: Design and implement the user interface components for the IPSA extension, including the main panel, document viewer, and findings extraction interface.

subtasks.title: Create IPSA Panel Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement the main IPSA panel as a VS Code WebView that displays the current session state and provides controls.

subtasks.title: Develop Plan Document Viewer/Editor
subtasks.description: Implement a specialized viewer and editor for plan documents that provides a structured view of the problem-solving process.

subtasks.title: Build Findings Extraction Interface
subtasks.description: Create a user interface for extracting and categorizing findings from AI assistant responses.

subtasks.title: Implement Command Palette Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate with VS Code's Command Palette, providing commands for all IPSA functionality.

tasks.title: External Integrations
tasks.description: Implement integrations with external systems, including AI assistants, Git version control, and Markdown processing.

subtasks.title: Implement AI Assistant Integration
subtasks.description: Create the integration with various AI assistants within VS Code, including clipboard-based and command-based approaches.

subtasks.title: Develop Git Integration
subtasks.description: Implement integration with Git version control for tracking changes to plan documents and code files.

subtasks.title: Create Markdown Processing System
subtasks.description: Build the system for processing Markdown content in plan documents, including parsing, rendering, and manipulation.

tasks.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive testing for the IPSA extension, including unit tests, integration tests, and performance testing.

subtasks.title: Set Up Unit Testing Framework
subtasks.description: Configure the unit testing framework and create initial test suites for core components.

subtasks.title: Implement Integration Tests
subtasks.description: Create integration tests to verify that components work together correctly and integrate properly with VS Code.

subtasks.title: Develop End-to-End Tests
subtasks.description: Implement end-to-end tests to verify the complete user workflow and interaction with AI assistants.

subtasks.title: Conduct Performance Testing
subtasks.description: Create performance tests to ensure the extension meets performance requirements and doesn't impact VS Code performance.

tasks.title: Documentation and Deployment
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for the IPSA extension and prepare it for deployment to the VS Code Marketplace.

subtasks.title: Write User Documentation
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive user documentation, including installation instructions, usage guides, and best practices.

subtasks.title: Develop Technical Documentation
subtasks.description: Write technical documentation for developers who want to understand, contribute to, or extend the IPSA extension.

subtasks.title: Create API Documentation
subtasks.description: Document all public APIs and interfaces, including usage examples and extension points.

tasks.title: Packaging and Release
tasks.description: Package the IPSA extension for release and publish it to the VS Code Marketplace.

subtasks.title: Configure Extension Packaging
subtasks.description: Set up the packaging configuration for the VS Code extension, including metadata and assets.

subtasks.title: Prepare for VS Code Marketplace
subtasks.description: Prepare the extension for publication to the VS Code Marketplace, including required assets and descriptions.

subtasks.title: Create Release Process
subtasks.description: Establish a release process for future updates, including versioning and changelog management.

tasks.title: Advanced Features and Enhancements
tasks.description: Implement advanced features and enhancements to improve the IPSA extension's functionality and user experience.

subtasks.title: Implement Plan Document Templates
subtasks.description: Create a system for using and managing plan document templates to streamline the problem-solving process.

subtasks.title: Develop Findings Visualization
subtasks.description: Create visualizations for findings to help users understand relationships and dependencies.

subtasks.title: Implement Collaborative Features
subtasks.description: Add features to support collaboration between multiple users working on the same problem.

subtasks.title: Create Analytics Dashboard
subtasks.description: Develop an analytics dashboard to track problem-solving metrics and progress.
